name: @switchboard-xyz/cli
description: command line tool to interact with switchboard
author: gallynaut @gallynaut

scripts.prepack: yarn build && oclif manifest && oclif readme
scripts.local:validator: mkdir -p .anchor/test-ledger; solana-test-validator -q -r --ledger .anchor/test-ledger --mint $(solana-keygen pubkey ~/.config/solana/id.json) --bind-address 0.0.0.0 --url https://api.devnet.solana.com --rpc-port 8899  --clone 2TfB33aLaneQb5TNVwyDz3jSZXS6jdW2ARw1Dgf84XCG `# programId` --clone J4CArpsbrZqu1axqQ4AnrqREs3jwoyA1M5LMiQQmAzB9 `# programDataAddress` --clone CKwZcshn4XDvhaWVH9EXnk3iu19t6t5xP2Sy2pD6TRDp `# idlAddress` --clone BYM81n8HvTJuqZU1PmTVcwZ9G8uoji7FKM6EaPkwphPt `# programState` --clone FVLfR6C2ckZhbSwBzZY4CX7YBcddUSge5BNeGQv5eKhy `# switchboardVault`
scripts.localnet:up: npm run local:validator & sleep 15 && npm run watch

target.unversioned: tarballs/<%- bin %>/<%- channel === 'stable' ? '' : 'channels/' + channel + '/' %><%- bin %>-<%- platform %>-<%- arch %><%- ext %>
target.versioned: tarballs/<%- bin %>/<%- channel === 'stable' ? '' : 'channels/' + channel + '/' %><%- bin %>-v<%- version %>/<%- bin %>-v<%- version %>-<%- platform %>-<%- arch %><%- ext %>
target.manifest: tarballs/<%- bin %>/<%- channel === 'stable' ? '' : 'channels/' + channel + '/' %><%- platform %>-<%- arch %>

vanilla.unversioned: tarballs/<%- bin %>/<%- channel === 'stable' ? '' : 'channels/' + channel + '/' %><%- bin %><%- ext %>
vanilla.versioned: tarballs/<%- bin %>/<%- channel === 'stable' ? '' : 'channels/' + channel + '/' %><%- bin %>-v<%- version %>/<%- bin %>-v<%- version %><%- ext %>

oracle.description: fetch oracle logs for a given cluster

solana:aggregator.description: interact with a switchboard aggregator account

solana:lease.description: interact with a switchboard lease account

solana:crank.description: interact with a switchboard crank account

solana:queue.description: interact with a switchboard oracle queue account

solana:job.description: interact with a switchboard job account

solana:oracle.description: interact with a switchboard oracle account

solana:print.description: find and print a switchboard account by public key for a given cluster

aptos:aggregator.description: interact with a switchboard aggregator account

aptos:lease.description: interact with a switchboard lease account

aptos:crank.description: interact with a switchboard crank account

aptos:queue.description: interact with a switchboard oracle queue account

aptos:job.description: interact with a switchboard job account

aptos:oracle.description: interact with a switchboard oracle account

aptos:print.description: find and print a switchboard account by public key

near:aggregator.description: interact with a switchboard aggregator account

near:lease.description: interact with a switchboard lease account

near:crank.description: interact with a switchboard crank account

near:queue.description: interact with a switchboard oracle queue account

near:job.description: interact with a switchboard job account

near:oracle.description: interact with a switchboard oracle account

near:print.description: find and print a switchboard account by public key
